name: newScriptingObject(of:forValueForKey:withContentsValue:properties:)
desc: Creates and returns an instance of a scriptable class, setting its contents and properties, for insertion into the relationship identified by the key.
declaration:
func newScriptingObject(of objectClass: AnyClass, 
         forValueForKey key: String, 
      withContentsValue contentsValue: Any?, 
             properties: [String : Any]) -> Any?
